already_received: You have already received your starter pack
success: You have received your starter pack, Enjoy!
progress_cancelled: You have cancelled the starter pack progress
not_near_receiving_point: You are not near the receiving point
no_available_spawn: Possible area for vehicle spawn is occupied
player_in_vehicle: You can't receive the starter pack while in the vehicle
safezone_exit: You are no longer in a safe zone
failed_captcha: You have failed the captcha, please try again
accepted_rules: Thank you for accepting the rules, you can now receive your starter pack
declined_rules: You must accept the rules to receive the starter pack
answered_correctly: You have successfully answered all the question
answered_incorrectly: You have failed to answer all the questions correctly, please try again
